title: 148862914.dont Be Lazy Dont Be Idle
excerpt: That, in just one sentence, is the secret to most success.

children.text: That, in just one sentence, is the secret to most success.
Sure, there's also access and opportunity and a great bit of luck involved.
But if you're waiting on those other things before you're willing to face the grind, you'll never be prepared if they ever arrive at your door.
Better to rid yourself of habitual sluggishness now than before it's too late.
